name: Energy Gain
description:
In this fast-paced top down fighter you must use multiple different powers and approches to take down the enemies you encounter. Be careful though, everytime you pick up a power it will only last for one use so don't miss.

Controls:
Walk: WASD or Arrows
Ability: Spacebar
You have only one use of your ability and if you have nothing then that is replaced with a dash.

Powers:
Beam
Shoot
Slash
Homing
Spread

Tommy - Art / Music / Programming
SoundFX pack used but hopefully updated soon to selfmade - https://epicstockmedia.com/product/mmo-game-magic/
